scenario_text.value: Wait, Takuma! Not that way! It’s dangerous!
Miu? What are you doing here?

I didn’t know where you went, so I got
worried and decided to look for you.

And here you are, out in the forest like
I thought. You really had me scared!

Oh, sorry. But is the forest really that
dangerous? It doesn’t look so bad.
Right. It doesn’t look that way.

But you need to imagine that the enemy could
be hiding anywhere.

We’ve been ambushed so many times...and each
time we’ve had to fight for our lives.

Anyway, never go anywhere alone if you can
help it, okay?
Miu...

Takuma? What is it? You seem kind of
distracted.
Is there something on my face?

You’ve changed a bit while I was gone. You’re
a bit more mature now.
Huh, really? You really think so?!
Yeah. More self-assured, I think...

Eheheh... Me and the others had our fair
share of battles while you were gone, y’know!

Still, you’re the only one who’s ever said
something like that to me.

Kaito’s always gonna treat me like a child,
anyway.
Ha ha... Yeah, that’s Kaito all over.
You’re telling me!

...By the way, Takuma. Can I ask you
something?
Yeah?
